species.name: gastrodon
descriptions: Eats beach sand for nourishment. Should one Gastrodon encounter another of a different color, a fierce battle will inevitably ensue.
It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.
It has strong regenerative capabilities. Even if parts of it are bitten off by fish Pokémon, it will return to normal within a few hours.
Its search for food sometimes leads it onto land, where it leaves behind a sticky trail of slime as it passes through.

abilities.name: sticky-hold
abilities.effect: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: storm-drain
abilities.effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
